first_translate: mr. magician! are you alright?
some monsters survived!
get ready  for battle!
the giant was aiming straight at me...

hangle: 이 소년이 나와 함께 구르지 않았다면
first_translate: if this boy hadn’t rolled around on the ground with me just now,
I would’ve died.

hangle: 죽은 줄 알았더니, 숨이 붙은 개체가 있었나?!
first_translate: damn... I thought we killed them all!

hangle: 어떡해. 날 안고 굴러서 부상이 악화됐나 봐.
first_translate: sh*t... did his injuries get worse from rolling around like that?
it’s too late to help him up now!
I’m fine.
but more importantly...
come to your senses...!
in that moment when our faces were so close together,

hangle: 나는 퍼뜩 한 가지 사실을 깨달았다.
first_translate: I realized something important.
his worn-out clothes made him look like some sort of mercenary.
his hair was as black as the night sky.
and he had beautiful blue-gray eyes.
even though he was covered in dust, there was nothing ordinary about how he looked.
no wonder I didn’t recognize him earlier because of how young he looks.

hangle: 이 녀석, 남자 주인공인 시그렌 아냐?!
first_translate: isn’t this guy siegren, the male protagonist?!

hangle: ※본 작품은 저작권법에 의해 보호를 받는 저작물로 불법 복제와 캡처 등을 이용한 무단 전재 및 유포, 공유하는 것을 금합니다.
